quote: If you do what is easy, life will be hard. If you do what is hard, life will become easy.
why_clipworthy: This quote encapsulates the essence of taking the hard but rewarding path in business and life.
suggested_hook: Why doing the hard things now can make your life easier later.

quote: Spend 15 minutes every morning looking at your bank accounts and credit card statements.
why_clipworthy: Provides a simple, actionable tactic to improve financial awareness and management.
suggested_hook: A 15-minute daily habit that can transform your financial life.
